meanings.definition: A set of letters or symbols in a fixed order used to represent the basic sounds of a language.
meanings.sent1: Learning the alphabet is the first step in reading.
meanings.sent2: She practiced writing each letter of the alphabet.
meanings.sent3: The alphabet decided to throw a party for the vowels.
meanings.sent4: In the alphabet of life, each letter represents a different experience.
meanings.sent5: The colorful alphabet chart on the wall made learning fun.

meanings.definition: The letters of a language arranged in a customary order.
meanings.sent1: The alphabet on the keyboard makes typing easier.
meanings.sent2: He recited the alphabet backwards as a challenge.
meanings.sent3: The alphabet went on strike, demanding better spacing between letters.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an alphabet soup of thoughts and ideas.
meanings.sent5: The alphabet blocks helped the child learn to spell.
